title: Is it just me or does gypsylord make the best champs?
body:
Vi, Jinx, Gnar and Ekko.

godbless gypsylord, up his pay rito.

replies.body: tbh rammus is the best champion in the game.
Who says he doesnt get payed alot and just makes only a few champs because hes milking them? lol renekton,azir,draven  are good too
